category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: METWIShowPreviewFile
preference.preference_description: Defines the default display mode of the Textual Work Instruction view in the Manufacturing Process Planner (MPP) application. The display is done according to the format specified by the preference "MEWiPreviewFormat". Valid Values: * true: to activate the view mode. This is the default value. * false: to activate the edit mode.
